import React, { Component } from 'react' import { withRouter } from "react-router"; import axios from 'axios' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import { Table} from 'react-bootstrap'; class Patient extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { person:{} } } componentDidMount() { console.log({props:this.props}) const id = this.props.match.params.id axios.get(`http://localhost:8080/persons/${id}`) .then(response => { console.log(response.data) this.setState({person: response.data}) }) } render() { const person = this.state.person return (

Patient Details

Patient Id {person.id}
Patient Name {person.name}
Email {person.email}
Age {person.age}
Patient Location {person.location}
Report Status {person.reportstatus}
Blood Group {person.bloodgroup}
Contact Number {person.contactno}
Gender {person.gender}
Back
) } } export default withRouter(Patient);
